title: Web Developer
objective: To achieve professional and financial growth while contributing to the success of the organization through my skills, knowledge, sincerity, dedication and honesty as part of a collaborative team. I aim to leverage my expertise in Angular, JavaScript, and Node.js to develop user-friendly, responsive, and scalable web applications. I am committed to bringing innovative ideas to the table and continuously enhancing my technical skills to meet organizational and industry standards.
professionalSummary: Senior Software Engineer with over 5 years of professional experience in Angular development and a total of 7 years in the IT industry. Passionate about crafting clean, efficient, and scalable code within the Angular framework, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality, user-friendly web applications. Adept at analyzing and resolving complex technical challenges while maintaining a proactive and solution-oriented mindset. Highly motivated to stay updated with the latest technologies and best practices, ensuring continuous improvement and innovation. A collaborative team player who thrives in dynamic environments and is committed to being a valuable contributor to organizational success.

cv.label: Hobbies
cv.value: Surfing about new technologies and Listening to music

recognition: Specialist at delivering ideas and solutions in Angular & JS
